forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 14C. S winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Rain, heavy at times early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
